channel.title: Posts on Wendy's Hacker Mom Space
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Wendy's Hacker Mom Space

item.title: Why I started this blog
item.description: I never imagined myself as someone who shares parenting advice. Growing up, I’m simply not a “mom type”. In fact, for most of the time in my life, I did not want children - I am simply too career focused, persuing an intellectual lifestyle; so chasing after a toddler and being bothered with milk supply didn’t seem like my thing. So why am I blogging now? Well, after I married a great guy, we started to dream about having a family.
